familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in Rent or Royalties Capital Gains income from B MONMOUTH MALL, LLC (Commercial Real Estate in Eatontown, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: B Monmouth Mall, LLC (Commercial Real Estate In Eatontown, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Non-member Manager of B Monmouth Mall, LLC from Aug 1, 2015, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from B MONMOUTH MALL, LLC (Commercial Real Estate in Eatontown, NJ) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because his interest in this entity reportedly has been divested, the potential conflict of interest is marked in this database as resolved.
